solution_line_template: Zoe ate {num_strawberries} strawberries x {calories_per_strawberry} calories each = <<{num_strawberries}*{calories_per_strawberry}={calories_from_strawberries}>>{calories_from_strawberries} calories.
Zoe ate {ounces_yogurt} ounces of yogurt x {calories_per_ounce_yogurt} calories per ounce = <<{ounces_yogurt}*{calories_per_ounce_yogurt}={calories_from_yogurt}>>{calories_from_yogurt} calories.
Zoe at a total of {calories_from_strawberries} calories + {calories_from_yogurt} calories = <<{calories_from_strawberries}+{calories_from_yogurt}={total_calories}>>{total_calories} calories.
